short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlays ASCII art on the battlelands with graphic elements from the original TITAN boardgame

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for members of the ACTS website, it overlays the text interface of the TITAN battle-lands with graphical elements, that resemble the original art and improves the user experience with a modern interface.

Updates (version 0.0.0.3)
- Added BALROG and ENT creatures
- Created TITAN creature table reference page
